titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a permanent extension of the credit for producing electricity from wind.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a permanent extension of the credit for producing electricity from wind.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the tax credit for producing electricity from wind facilities.
